title: The Batman Review
description:
Go to http://bit.ly/rt_kindafunny to get Guild Wars 2: End of Dragons!

Tim, Barrett, and Joey give their thoughts on Matt Reeve's The Batman. Full spoiler-filled Batman In Review with Greg, Nick, Kevin, Andy, and Tim later this week!

Epic Creator Code: KindaFunny
